Player History
Injured on 6/13/1966 with a Bruised Foot, out for 3 days...
Injured on 7/9/1969 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Released by San Francisco on 7/21/1969...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/4/1970 to a 4-year deal worth $650,000 per year...
Injured on 5/21/1973 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1976...
Traded from Los Angeles to Detroit on 1/31/1977 (Going to LA: CF K. Yamamoto, RF J. Clark. Going to DET: RF J. Burroughs, P D. Vossler, SS W. Randolph, C E. Rodriguez)...
